TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SCNSceneExportProgressHandler(float totalProgress, NSError error, out bool stop);
.class public auto ansi sealed SCNSceneExportProgressHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A number in [0,1.0] that indicates the relative progress of the export operation.
Developers set this to true to cancel processing.
Docs.summary: Continuation handler that SceneKit repeatedly calls when exporting a scene.
